short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Asayer Chrome Plugin for Recording Tests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is part of Asayer Synthetics. It makes it easy to create end-to-end tests right from the browser.

Asayer is a frontend monitoring tool that helps developers reproduce bugs, track errors and improve performance. Visit our website for more details.
